storyInfo: In the dead of night, a wounded patient finds his way to the door of Aak's clinic. In the course of the treatment, Aak discovers that his client's identity might be a lot more complicated than it seems.

attributes.content: How're you holdin' up, dai lo? Is your wound still hurting? Hang in there, I'll get you to the hospital right away.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: *inhales sharply*... No, Ah Jun. We can't go to there. We'll be found out...
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: You idiot, we'd be walkin' straight into quicksand if we go to the hospital. The docs over there are sharp. They'll know something's up the moment they see a wound like this.
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: B-But... Yu, we can't just leave him like this, can we?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: I heard there's a small clinic up at the front of this alley. Wanna head there and try your luck?
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: There won't be as many doctors in a small-time place like that, so it'll be easy to keep things under control. Why don't we...?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Sure... Let's go. I think it'll be fine.
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: Hang in there, dai lo. We'll get you there.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Windows... Locked. Curtains... Can't leave a single gap.
attributes.name: A Doctor
A Doctor
attributes.content: Stuff under the beds... Lemme see...

attributes.name: A Doctor
attributes.content: Good. Everything's there.
And what else... Ah, of course, gotta lock up the door.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Good thing I remembered. Nearly forgot there...
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: (Who is it––?)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: (Don't think I've seen their mugs before...)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Nei hou. Who might you be?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Is there a doctor in the house? My brother here... He's hurt. Can you save him?
We're closed for the day. Could I ask you to come back tomorrow?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Doc, you... How could you just turn down a guy on death's door like that?!
If it's really that serious, why not go to a proper hospital for treatment instead of knockin' on the door of my shack off the corner of the street in the middle of the night?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: The more you argue with me, the more it proves your bro over there is far from death's door.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: The hell? What kind of doctor are you anyway to be talking like that?
Huh, that's funny. I never said anything about being a doctor.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Give it up. You can't kick this door down.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Sei puk gaai...
(Did they leave...?)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: The anxious doctor holds his breath and stretches his neck to look out the door's mirror, seeing no one standing under the eaves.

Just to be sure, however, he puts his ear close to the door's panel. After a while, when he is sure that no sounds are coming from the other side of the door, he steadies his nerves and clutches his chest as he finally lets out a deep exhale.
Phew...
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: (That scared me half to death, I thought one of the old man's enemies came to settle the score.)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: (Never expected someone to show up looking for a doctor at this hour though. Weird... Don't tell me that old timer I saved a few days ago is talking up my medical skills again.)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: What a pain... Should've left this place to rot a long time ago. All I wanted was to put some food on the table, and maybe fix a few sniffles and head colds in the process.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Ugh... But, I let curiosity get the better of me when I saw that old timer's condition.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: This place shouldn't last much longer. The old man pissed off so many people, it won't be long until someone comes bangin' on the door after they hear the news.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Crap... I gotta get outta here.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Ugh, what awful luck. Barely got half a year of normalcy... When am I gonna be able to stop running and hiding?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Huh–?!
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: (Shit... I forgot to latch the back door...)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Heheh. Sir, your rear entrance isn't as secure as the front door. All it took was a few bits of metal wire.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Hmm... Sounds like your brother's injury must be pretty serious. Can't wait a moment, can you?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: You little shit. If you know what's good for you, you'll shut your trap and fix him up. Anything happens to him, you're a dead man.
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: C'mon, buddy... If you help me out this time, I promise, I'll return the favor. You won't regret it.
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: The two of you are singin' very two different tunes, but I like the sound of it.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: You're overthinking it, man.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Heh. And what tune will you be singing?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Whatever you want to hear. There's no shame in that.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Smooth talker, aren't we–
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Gah! You bastard!
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Hey, what the hell are you doing? Hands off, don't hurt me!
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Quit your yapping, buddy. Just behave yourself, and, *cough* *cough*... think carefully about how you're gonna fix me up.
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: Urgh... Hiss...
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: Are you even taking this seriously, you little shit?
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: Can't you tell I'm stitching up a wound?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Enough of that, Yu. By the way, sir, would you happen to have any anesthetics?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: You think a little hut like mine would have stuff like that? Don't come here if you're afraid of a little pain.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: My medicine bottle!
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Mind your tone, if you care about whatever's left of this stuff.
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: (Calm down, calm down. One of these bastards' arms is as thick as both my legs...)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Alright. I'm gonna chat with your brother here to distract him from the pain, alright?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Hey, can you still talk?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Run that mouth, if you want. Just don't stop working.
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: So, how'd you get that injury along your back? Looks like your skin and muscle literally got ripped apart. Almost twenty centimeters from your shoulders to the back of your waist after I measured it.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Got caught on the spikes of an iron fence.
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: Were you hopping a wall?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Excuse me, but did my words offend you in some way?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Mind your own business. There are some questions you shouldn't ask.
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: (Patience, patience. I don't have any drugs on hand capable of dealing with these guys...)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Say... How did you find this place?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Someone told us there's a small clinic here. Said he's been here before.
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: So, you're really just here to get an injury treated?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Why else?
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: Nobody said anything about me, right? Anything like... about some of the 'patients' I saw before?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Nothing I care about.
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: (Looks like they're just a bunch of nobodies... I've been overreacting here.)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: You're a hard one to talk to, huh? Forget it, I'll just put the radio on; maybe it'll make a better conversation partner.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: (Gah, if you aren't some Triad here looking for revenge, I guess you're the unlucky one for falling into my hands.)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: This is a breaking news report. At 6:00 PM today, the Lungmen Jewelry Co. was viciously robbed.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Three gangsters armed with short crossbows subdued the clerk, pried open the counter, and fled with jewelry valued in the tens of millions.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Authorities reported that following the robbery, the L.G.D. rushed to the scene of the crime and confirmed that the shop assistant was in critical condition after trying to fight off the criminals, and is currently in intensive care.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: According to the clerk's statements, the three criminals were all wearing masks, and one of them sustained an injury to his back, which should've left a wound.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: We hope that people from all walks of life will proactively provide information about these at-large suspects...
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Shut up already, dumb machine.
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: The man sitting at the table rudely presses the power button before the announcement can finish.
The doctor stiffly turns his head and sees a look of displeasure on the man's face, his hands in his pockets as if brandishing something.
When he lowers his head again and looks at the bloody back of the man lying on the bed, the doctor sucks in a mouthful of cold air.
(Well, shit...)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: This isn't good.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: What isn't good?
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: (*gulp*)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Uhh... What else would it be? His wound, umm... I don't have enough medicine here. All I can do is some suture work, but I can't say how well he'll recover later.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Hey, man, what the hell are you standing up for?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: I just want to make a quick call to have someone bring over some more medicine. What are you getting all tense for?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Making a call? No, we can't have you doing that.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: (Looks like I'm right on the money here, given how paranoid they are. What do I do now then...?)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: (If I'm not careful... They're gonna shut me up forever to keep the evidence from leaking out.)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: (Or maybe... No, I can't. I can't reveal my identity. Not now, after I'm so close to finally breaking from the old ways and settling down.)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: (*sticks a hand into his pocket and strokes something*)
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: (Shit, he's reaching into his pocket again... Is it a knife? Or a mini crossbow?)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: (Calm down, there has to be some way...)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: (I got it!)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: (Wait, no, if I do that... my identity's gonna get blown.)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Hey, what are you doing over there, all quiet?
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: I'm... thinking hard about how to get the meds your brother needs since you won't let me place a call.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Your brother's lying there and he's not getting better without drugs. You're not just gonna wait around and let him die, are you?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: (Ugh... I can't think too far down the road. I need to make it out of this alive first.)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: How about this? One of you can go to buy the medicine while the other one stays here. Don't worry, with a twiggy body like mine, what's the worst I could do to your dai lo?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Hmm... What do you say, Yu?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Ah Jun, go get the meds. I'll keep an eye on this kid.
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: What if he pulls something?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: What are you worrying for? You think this kid's gonna be able to pull any funny business with me around?
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: Diu... This pharmacy's out in the middle of nowhere. You're really not making this easy for me, aren't you?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Excuse me, anybody home?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Coming, coming. Give me a second, I'll be right out.
attributes.name: Pharmacy Owner

attributes.content: I have a prescription here. do you have all the meds on THIS sheet?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: I do, but...
attributes.name: Pharmacy Owner

attributes.content: But what? If you have 'em, just bring 'em out. My brother needs 'em badly.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Your brother... is going to use them? If you don't mind me asking, friend, what kind of work does your brother do?
attributes.name: Pharmacy Owner

attributes.content: Look, if you know what's good for you, you'll stop prying into our business. His work isn't something for people like you to ask about.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Right, right... The stuff you wanted is, ah yes... I'll have the clerk bring everything out shortly.
attributes.name: Pharmacy Owner

attributes.content: Hurry it up!
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Miss An, please. Pull the medicines here as they appear on the sheet. Don't get anything mixed up.
attributes.name: Pharmacy Owner

attributes.content: (Also, I need to make a phone call to that gentleman... The man's not dead. He's back.)
attributes.name: Pharmacy Owner

attributes.content: Hey, could you stop pacing back and forth? It's making me dizzy.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Hmph. If he doesn't come back, you're gonna have hell to pay.
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: Don't worry. I sent him to a well-hidden pharmacy. Nobody's gonna know.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Looking at the time, he should be back any minute now...
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: See, there he is.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Ah Jun, did you get the stuff?
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: Yeah. How's the dai lo?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Not dead yet. Just waiting for you to bring the meds.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Here's the stuff you wanted.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Excellent. Everything here's good stuff.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Yu, we need to grab the dai lo and get out of here ASAP. While you were on the way back, I heard L.G.D. sirens in the distance. Looks like they've already started searching this neighborhood.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Wait a little. Let's leave after we grab the meds.
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: Hey, what the hell are you doing, you little shit? What are you making a ruckus for?
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: Have your bro take this wound-dressing medicine three times a day. Then, there's this dose of tonic. Have him take it every day before going to bed. The wound should be fully healed in a couple weeks.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Also, this is the savings I've accumulated over the past six months. Take it.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: What are you doing, man...?
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: Spending money to buy some peace of mind. You don't want to talk about where you came from, so you must not want anyone asking about where you're going either. I can only do the sensible thing and send you off respectfully.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: All I ask is that you spare my life, and if fate happens to bring us together again in the future, you can come to me if you ever get a headache.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: (*sticks his hand in hand in his pocket again and brandishes something*)
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: (Is he still not satisfied? I've already coughed up everything I can.)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: How about this, then? I'll lure away the L.G.D. so the three of you can get away safely.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Your dai lo can put on my clothes, and I'll put on his bloody outfit. The two of you swap too.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: I'll head out the front to attract the L.G.D.'s attention, then you guys can slip out through the back. How about it?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: (Why's this little shit being so cooperative all of a sudden? He was so difficult earlier.)
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: (Who wouldn't wise up after getting a taste of your fists?)
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: (Good point. Now that the kid knows his place, we know where to come whenever we're short on money.)
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: Ahaha, I never thought you'd to be such a loyal little buddy! We appreciate the favor!
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: Ah Jun, Yu, make sure to express your gratitude to the gentleman here.
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: Hah. Didn't think the kid was actually telling the truth, but he really went to lure the L.G.D. away from us.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Uhh... Where are we?
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: Once we get out of this alley, we'll be on the Rat King's turf. The L.G.D. isn't gonna set foot there, so we can lay low for a while.
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: Did you hide all the money?
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: Yup. Buried it all under the pine tree in the yard. When things calm down later, we can go dig it out. It's enough to... Well, dunno how much exactly, but we'll never have to worry about money again for the rest of our lives.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: When it's time to dig up our loot, if your injury's healed by then, we'll head out to the gambling den and play to our hearts' content.
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: Wait, hold on...
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: Who the hell are you people?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Grab them. Don't let them get away.
attributes.name: Triad

attributes.content: Hey, you. Get your hand out of your pocket.
attributes.name: Triad

attributes.content: What do you want?
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: What's in your pocket? Show me!
attributes.name: Triad

attributes.content: Nothing.
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: What are you fidgeting with then?
attributes.name: Triad

attributes.content: Talk, now!
attributes.name: Triad

attributes.content: Th-There's a loose thread in my pocket, and I was just trying to pluck it out...
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: You gentlemen look like Triads... I'm not sure what we did to provoke you.
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: Are you the one who sent him to buy meds from Shum's?
attributes.name: Triad

attributes.content: Yes, I got hurt and urgently needed medicine, so I sent my younger brother.
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: Well, would you look at that. So you're the poison-dealing rogue doctor. You've been hiding for over half a year, but we've finally found you.
attributes.name: Triad

attributes.content: Get your hands off him!
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: Aaaargh!
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: Making this hard on yourself, huh...? Beat the shit out of him.
attributes.name: Triad

attributes.content: Stop, stop! Look, Yu's the one who protects the dai lo, and he got hurt, so he's kind of out of it.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: We don't know anything about this rogue doctor, but I'm sure this is all some sort of misunderstanding.
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: Hmph. Save it for our dai lo and see if he cares to hear you out. Take them away.
attributes.name: Triad

attributes.content: Urgh...
attributes.name: Anguished Man

attributes.content: Dai lo, dai lo! Are you alright?!
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Urgh, where are you dragging us off to?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Grab that guy and take him too.
attributes.name: Triad

attributes.content: Let go of me! I can walk by myself!
attributes.name: Muscular Man

attributes.content: Haha, looks like it was one big misunderstanding.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: Kid, you showed up in the middle of the street in those bloody rags. How could our officers not be suspicious?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: Understandable, understandable.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Alright, this is as far as we can take you. Hurry on home now.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: Uhh, I'm afraid I can't go back at the moment.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Haha, don't you worry. We've already taken the robbers into custody.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: Already? Didn't I just tip you off?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: We tracked them from an underground pawn shop not long after the robbery and located them not long after.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: A pawn shop? If they went to a pawn shop, the guys who showed up at my place yesterday were...
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Probably just some petty thieves. Someone filed a police report that someone broke into their home, and I guess there were bloodstains on the railings.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: Oh, I thought...
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: (They didn't lie to me after all. That guy really did get hurt hopping a fence.)
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Thought what?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: Nothing.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Too bad...
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: What do you mean by that, young man?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: Officer... There's something I was trying to do, but it didn't work out in the end.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: I see. Well, young folks like you have plenty of opportunities to get back on your feet. Doesn't matter if you get knocked down a few times.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: How will you know what you really want if you don't go out there and try?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: The two of us are too alike. It's both a blessing and a curse.
attributes.name: Rogue Doctor

attributes.content: Old man, if you've got extra time on your hands, go pop some pills for your dementia. Who the hell have you been messin' with lately? Because of you, I got chased up and down the streets for no reason.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Hah. And you made it out in one piece thanks to the ol' tricks I taught you, huh?
attributes.name: Rogue Doctor

attributes.content: What, so I owe you my thanks or something? I must've had some great karma to land an old piece of shit like you for a dad.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Heh, the honor is mine.
attributes.name: Rogue Doctor

attributes.content: So, you really can't keep your head down even for a few days so I can enjoy a peaceful ones?
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Give it up already. You know that life ain't for you.
attributes.name: Rogue Doctor

attributes.content: Guess so. Even if you kick the bucket, your enemies wouldn't give me a moment of peace 'til the day I follow after you.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Ah Zai, even if you didn't have guys coming after you, you wouldn't get to live a life like that.
attributes.name: Rogue Doctor

attributes.content: I told you, the two of us are too alike. We've got the very same restlessness in our bones.
attributes.name: Rogue Doctor

attributes.content: What a load of shit. I'm nothing like you.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: ...Officer.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Wh-What are you staring at me for, all of a sudden?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: It's a darned shame there are so few paths available for me. If this path is blocked, I can only go back to the one I was on before.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: It's not an easy path to walk, but... it's not all bad either. At least, it'll keep me entertained.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Things are a tad too boring these days.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: Anyway, I won't bother you anymore. You seem like a good person, so hopefully our paths never cross again.
attributes.name: A Doctor

attributes.content: What's with that kid, talking all lofty and philosophical all of a sudden? People these days don't make any sense.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: Well, whatever. Still got a lot of work to do though, so I should hurry on back for now.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: Wait a second, Officer Chang.
Oh, Mr. Lee, you're here too?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: Long time no see. I heard you were blessed with a lovely daughter recently?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Hahaha, no news escapes your ears, Mr. Lee. An absolute chonker of a girl, six catties. Worked my wife half to death.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: Oh my. You'd best hurry to the jewelry store and pick up a pair of gold bracelets to properly show your appreciation for her.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Way ahead of you. Got it right here in my pocket.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: I suppose the two of us won't be able to go drinking anytime soon then.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Please. As if I could ever turn down an invitation from you, sir.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: You're a slick talker; I like that. I'll have to have a good chat with your boss.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'm afraid you came here for nothing then. The old fellow's tied up with a conference right now and still hasn't come out.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: Did something big happen?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You haven't heard?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: About what?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Uh... I suppose telling you won't do any harm.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: Go on.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Apparently, that rogue doctor who caused all sorts of trouble in the city is back.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: Didn't you say he was dead?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That's right. But we just got a report today that someone went to the pharmacist he used to frequent and grabbed some medicinal herbs.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: There's nothing particularly unusual about those herbs by themselves, but when they're used together in a formula... there's only one man who could've prescribed it.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Supervisor

attributes.content: ...I see. Sounds like things are going to get lively around here again.
attributes.name: Lee
